page.title: 11 RECREATION
page.content: 1.Gorebridge Leisure Centre The leisure centre is in the main street of Gorebridge and is a brown brick building with a low roof.It has a car park to the front and flower beds with shrubs planted in them. There is a main hall and a lesser hall and two general purpose rooms used for meetings and quiet games.An attractive lounge has easy chairs and is well used by the old age pensioners who enjoy the cafe facilities.There are showers and changing rooms and equipment is available for hire. Mr. David Smith ,Convener of Leisure and Recreation opened the premises on the 25th April 1980. =Sports and Activities= Aikido,Badminton,Basketball,Boxing,Ca rpet bowls,Dancing, Drama,Fencing,Floral Art,Five-A-Side Football,Gymnastics,Handicrafts,Judo -
